00032 namespace btree
00033 {
00034     template <class NodeType, class BTreeType>
00035     class node_cache
00036     {
00037         node_cache();
00038         node_cache(const node_cache &);
00039         node_cache & operator =(const node_cache &);
00040 
00041     public:
00042         typedef BTreeType btree_type;
00043         typedef NodeType node_type;
00044         typedef typename node_type::block_type block_type;
00045         typedef typename node_type::bid_type bid_type;
00046         typedef typename btree_type::key_compare key_compare;
00047 
00048         typedef typename btree_type::alloc_strategy_type alloc_strategy_type;
00049         typedef stxxl::btree::lru_pager pager_type;
00050 
00051     private:
00052 
00053         btree_type * btree_;
00054         key_compare comp_;
00055 
00056         struct bid_comp
00057         {
00058             bool operator ()  (const bid_type & a, const bid_type & b) const
00059             {
00060                 return (a.storage < b.storage) || ( a.storage == b.storage && a.offset < b.offset);
00061             }
00062         };
00063 
00064         struct bid_hash
00065         {
00066             size_t operator() (const bid_type & bid) const
00067             {
00068                 size_t result =
00069                     longhash1(bid.offset + uint64(bid.storage));
00070                 return result;
00071             }
00072 #ifdef BOOST_MSVC
00073             bool operator ()  (const bid_type & a, const bid_type & b) const
00074             {
00075                 return (a.storage < b.storage) || ( a.storage == b.storage && a.offset < b.offset);
00076             }
00077             enum
00078             {                                   // parameters for hash table
00079                 bucket_size = 4,                                                // 0 < bucket_size
00080                 min_buckets = 8
00081             };                                  // min_buckets = 2 ^^ N, 0 < N
00082 #endif
00083         };
00084 
00085         std::vector<node_type *> nodes_;
00086         std::vector<request_ptr> reqs_;
00087         std::vector<bool> fixed_;
00088         std::vector<bool> dirty_;
00089         std::vector<int_type> free_nodes_;
00090 #ifdef BOOST_MSVC
00091         typedef stdext::hash_map < bid_type, int_type, bid_hash > hash_map_type;
00092 #else
00093         typedef __gnu_cxx::hash_map < bid_type, int_type, bid_hash > hash_map_type;
00094 #endif
00095 
00096         //typedef std::map<bid_type,int_type,bid_comp> BID2node_type;
00097         typedef hash_map_type BID2node_type;
00098 
00099         BID2node_type BID2node_;
00100         stxxl::btree::lru_pager pager_;
00101         block_manager * bm;
00102         alloc_strategy_type alloc_strategy_;
00103 
00104         int64 n_found;
00105         int64 n_not_found;
00106         int64 n_created;
00107         int64 n_deleted;
00108         int64 n_read;
00109         int64 n_written;
00110         int64 n_clean_forced;
00111 
00112         // changes btree pointer in all contained iterators
00113         void change_btree_pointers(btree_type * b)
00114         {
00115             typename std::vector<node_type *>::const_iterator it = nodes_.begin();
00116             for ( ; it != nodes_.end(); ++it)
00117             {
00118                 (*it)->btree_ = b;
00119             }
00120         }
00121 
00122     public:
00123         node_cache(     unsigned_type cache_size_in_bytes,
00124                         btree_type * btree__,
00125                         key_compare comp__
00126         ) :
00127             btree_(btree__),
00128             comp_(comp__),
00129             bm(block_manager::get_instance()),
00130             n_found(0),
00131             n_not_found(0),
00132             n_created(0),
00133             n_deleted(0),
00134             n_read(0),
00135             n_written(0),
00136             n_clean_forced(0)
00137         {
00138             const unsigned_type nnodes = cache_size_in_bytes / block_type::raw_size;
00139             STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node_cache constructor nodes=" << nnodes);
00140             if (nnodes < 3)
00141             {
00142                 STXXL_FORMAT_ERROR_MSG(msg, "btree::node_cache::node_cache  Too few memory for a node cache (<3)")
00143 
00144                 throw std::runtime_error(msg.str());
00145             }
00146             nodes_.reserve(nnodes);
00147             reqs_.resize(nnodes);
00148             free_nodes_.reserve(nnodes);
00149             fixed_.resize(nnodes, false);
00150             dirty_.resize(nnodes, true);
00151             for (unsigned_type i = 0; i < nnodes; ++i)
00152             {
00153                 nodes_.push_back(new node_type(btree_, comp_));
00154                 free_nodes_.push_back(i);
00155             }
00156 
00157             pager_type tmp_pager(nnodes);
00158             std::swap(pager_, tmp_pager);
00159         }
00160 
00161         unsigned_type size() const
00162         {
00163             return nodes_.size();
00164         }
00165 
00166         // returns the number of fixed pages
00167         unsigned_type nfixed() const
00168         {
00169             typename BID2node_type::const_iterator i = BID2node_.begin();
00170             typename BID2node_type::const_iterator end = BID2node_.end();
00171             unsigned_type cnt = 0;
00172             for ( ; i != end; ++i)
00173             {
00174                 if (fixed_[(*i).second])
00175                     ++cnt;
00176             }
00177             return cnt;
00178         }
00179 
00180         ~node_cache()
00181         {
00182             STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node_cache deconstructor addr=" << this);
00183             typename BID2node_type::const_iterator i = BID2node_.begin();
00184             typename BID2node_type::const_iterator end = BID2node_.end();
00185             for ( ; i != end; ++i)
00186             {
00187                 const unsigned_type p = (*i).second;
00188                 if (reqs_[p].valid())
00189                     reqs_[p]->wait();
00190 
00191                 if (dirty_[p])
00192                     nodes_[p]->save();
00193             }
00194             for (unsigned_type i = 0; i < size(); ++i)
00195                 delete nodes_[i];
00196         }
00197 
00198         node_type * get_new_node(bid_type & new_bid)
00199         {
00200             ++n_created;
00201 
00202             if (free_nodes_.empty())
00203             {
00204                 // need to kick a node
00205                 int_type node2kick;
00206                 unsigned_type i = 0;
00207                 const unsigned_type max_tries = size() + 1;
00208                 do
00209                 {
00210                     ++i;
00211                     node2kick = pager_.kick();
00212                     if (i == max_tries )
00213                     {
00214                         STXXL_ERRMSG(
00215                             "The node cache is too small, no node can be kicked out (all nodes are fixed) !");
00216                         STXXL_ERRMSG("Returning NULL node.");
00217                         return NULL;
00218                     }
00219                     pager_.hit(node2kick);
00220                 } while (fixed_[node2kick]);
00221 
00222 
00223                 if (reqs_[node2kick].valid())
00224                     reqs_[node2kick]->wait();
00225 
00226 
00227                 node_type & Node = *(nodes_[node2kick]);
00228 
00229                 if (dirty_[node2kick])
00230                 {
00231                     Node.save();
00232                     ++n_written;
00233                 }
00234                 else
00235                     ++n_clean_forced;
00236 
00237 
00238                 //reqs_[node2kick] = request_ptr(); // reset request
00239 
00240                 assert(BID2node_.find(Node.my_bid()) != BID2node_.end());
00241                 BID2node_.erase(Node.my_bid());
00242                 bm-> new_blocks<block_type>(1, alloc_strategy_, &new_bid);
00243 
00244                 BID2node_[new_bid] = node2kick;
00245 
00246                 Node.init(new_bid);
00247 
00248                 dirty_[node2kick] = true;
00249 
00250                 assert(size() == BID2node_.size() + free_nodes_.size());
00251 
00252                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node_cache get_new_node, need to kick node " << node2kick);
00253 
00254                 return &Node;
00255             }
00256 
00257 
00258             int_type free_node = free_nodes_.back();
00259             free_nodes_.pop_back();
00260             assert(fixed_[free_node] == false);
00261 
00262             bm->new_blocks<block_type>(1, alloc_strategy_, &new_bid);
00263             BID2node_[new_bid] = free_node;
00264             node_type & Node = *(nodes_[free_node]);
00265             Node.init(new_bid);
00266 
00267             // assert(!(reqs_[free_node].valid()));
00268 
00269             pager_.hit(free_node);
00270 
00271             dirty_[free_node] = true;
00272 
00273             assert(size() == BID2node_.size() + free_nodes_.size());
00274 
00275             STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node_cache get_new_node, free node " << free_node << "available");
00276 
00277             return &Node;
00278         }

00281 
00282         node_type * get_node(const bid_type & bid, bool fix = false)
00283         {
00284             typename BID2node_type::const_iterator it = BID2node_.find(bid);
00285             ++n_read;
00286 
00287             if (it != BID2node_.end())
00288             {
00289                 // the node is in cache
00290                 const int_type nodeindex = it->second;
00291                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node_cache get_node, the node " << nodeindex << "is in cache , fix=" << fix);
00292                 fixed_[nodeindex] = fix;
00293                 pager_.hit(nodeindex);
00294                 dirty_[nodeindex] = true;
00295 
00296                 if (reqs_[nodeindex].valid() && !reqs_[nodeindex]->poll())
00297                     reqs_[nodeindex]->wait();
00298 
00299 
00300                 ++n_found;
00301                 return nodes_[nodeindex];
00302             }
00303 
00304             ++n_not_found;
00305 
00306             // the node is not in cache
00307             if (free_nodes_.empty())
00308             {
00309                 // need to kick a node
00310                 int_type node2kick;
00311                 unsigned_type i = 0;
00312                 const unsigned_type max_tries = size() + 1;
00313                 do
00314                 {
00315                     ++i;
00316                     node2kick = pager_.kick();
00317                     if (i == max_tries)
00318                     {
00319                         STXXL_ERRMSG(
00320                             "The node cache is too small, no node can be kicked out (all nodes are fixed) !");
00321                         STXXL_ERRMSG("Returning NULL node.");
00322                         return NULL;
00323                     }
00324                     pager_.hit(node2kick);
00325                 } while (fixed_[node2kick]);
00326 
00327                 if (reqs_[node2kick].valid())
00328                     reqs_[node2kick]->wait();
00329 
00330 
00331                 node_type & Node = *(nodes_[node2kick]);
00332 
00333                 if (dirty_[node2kick])
00334                 {
00335                     Node.save();
00336                     ++n_written;
00337                 }
00338                 else
00339                     ++n_clean_forced;
00340 
00341 
00342 
00343                 BID2node_.erase(Node.my_bid());
00344 
00345                 reqs_[node2kick] = Node.load(bid);
00346                 BID2node_[bid] = node2kick;
00347 
00348                 fixed_[node2kick] = fix;
00349 
00350                 dirty_[node2kick] = true;
00351 
00352                 assert(size() == BID2node_.size() + free_nodes_.size());
00353 
00354                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node_cache get_node, need to kick node" << node2kick << " fix=" << fix);
00355 
00356                 return &Node;
00357             }
00358 
00359             int_type free_node = free_nodes_.back();
00360             free_nodes_.pop_back();
00361             assert(fixed_[free_node] == false);
00362 
00363             node_type & Node = *(nodes_[free_node]);
00364             reqs_[free_node] = Node.load(bid);
00365             BID2node_[bid] = free_node;
00366 
00367             pager_.hit(free_node);
00368 
00369             fixed_[free_node] = fix;
00370 
00371             dirty_[free_node] = true;
00372 
00373             assert(size() == BID2node_.size() + free_nodes_.size());
00374 
00375             STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node_cache get_node, free node " << free_node << "available, fix=" << fix);
00376 
00377             return &Node;
00378         }
00379 
00380         node_type const * get_const_node(const bid_type & bid, bool fix = false)
00381         {
00382             typename BID2node_type::const_iterator it = BID2node_.find(bid);
00383             ++n_read;
00384 
00385             if (it != BID2node_.end())
00386             {
00387                 // the node is in cache
00388                 const int_type nodeindex = it->second;
00389                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node_cache get_node, the node " << nodeindex << "is in cache , fix=" << fix);
00390                 fixed_[nodeindex] = fix;
00391                 pager_.hit(nodeindex);
00392 
00393                 if (reqs_[nodeindex].valid() && !reqs_[nodeindex]->poll())
00394                     reqs_[nodeindex]->wait();
00395 
00396 
00397                 ++n_found;
00398                 return nodes_[nodeindex];
00399             }
00400 
00401             ++n_not_found;
00402 
00403             // the node is not in cache
00404             if (free_nodes_.empty())
00405             {
00406                 // need to kick a node
00407                 int_type node2kick;
00408                 unsigned_type i = 0;
00409                 const unsigned_type max_tries = size() + 1;
00410                 do
00411                 {
00412                     ++i;
00413                     node2kick = pager_.kick();
00414                     if (i == max_tries)
00415                     {
00416                         STXXL_ERRMSG(
00417                             "The node cache is too small, no node can be kicked out (all nodes are fixed) !");
00418                         STXXL_ERRMSG("Returning NULL node.");
00419                         return NULL;
00420                     }
00421                     pager_.hit(node2kick);
00422                 } while (fixed_[node2kick]);
00423 
00424                 if (reqs_[node2kick].valid())
00425                     reqs_[node2kick]->wait();
00426 
00427 
00428                 node_type & Node = *(nodes_[node2kick]);
00429                 if (dirty_[node2kick])
00430                 {
00431                     Node.save();
00432                     ++n_written;
00433                 }
00434                 else
00435                     ++n_clean_forced;
00436 
00437 
00438                 BID2node_.erase(Node.my_bid());
00439 
00440                 reqs_[node2kick] = Node.load(bid);
00441                 BID2node_[bid] = node2kick;
00442 
00443                 fixed_[node2kick] = fix;
00444 
00445                 dirty_[node2kick] = false;
00446 
00447                 assert(size() == BID2node_.size() + free_nodes_.size());
00448 
00449                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node_cache get_node, need to kick node" << node2kick << " fix=" << fix);
00450 
00451                 return &Node;
00452             }
00453 
00454             int_type free_node = free_nodes_.back();
00455             free_nodes_.pop_back();
00456             assert(fixed_[free_node] == false);
00457 
00458             node_type & Node = *(nodes_[free_node]);
00459             reqs_[free_node] = Node.load(bid);
00460             BID2node_[bid] = free_node;
00461 
00462             pager_.hit(free_node);
00463 
00464             fixed_[free_node] = fix;
00465 
00466             dirty_[free_node] = false;
00467 
00468             assert(size() == BID2node_.size() + free_nodes_.size());
00469 
00470             STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node_cache get_node, free node " << free_node << "available, fix=" << fix);
00471 
00472             return &Node;
00473         }
00474 
00475         void delete_node(const bid_type & bid)
00476         {
00477             typename BID2node_type::const_iterator it = BID2node_.find(bid);
00478             try
00479             {
00480                 if (it != BID2node_.end())
00481                 {
00482                     // the node is in the cach
00483                     const int_type nodeindex = it->second;
00484                     STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node_cache delete_node " << nodeindex << " from cache.");
00485                     if (reqs_[nodeindex].valid())
00486                         reqs_[nodeindex]->wait();
00487 
00488                     //reqs_[nodeindex] = request_ptr(); // reset request
00489                     free_nodes_.push_back(nodeindex);
00490                     BID2node_.erase(bid);
00491                     fixed_[nodeindex] = false;
00492                 }
00493                 ++n_deleted;
00494             } catch (const io_error & ex)
00495             {
00496                 bm->delete_block(bid);
00497                 throw io_error(ex.what());
00498             }
00499             bm->delete_block(bid);
00500         }
00501 
00502 
00503         void prefetch_node(const bid_type & bid)
00504         {
00505             if (BID2node_.find(bid) != BID2node_.end())
00506                 return;
00507 
00508 
00509             // the node is not in cache
00510             if (free_nodes_.empty())
00511             {
00512                 // need to kick a node
00513                 int_type node2kick;
00514                 unsigned_type i = 0;
00515                 const unsigned_type max_tries = size() + 1;
00516                 do
00517                 {
00518                     ++i;
00519                     node2kick = pager_.kick();
00520                     if (i == max_tries)
00521                     {
00522                         STXXL_ERRMSG(
00523                             "The node cache is too small, no node can be kicked out (all nodes are fixed) !");
00524                         STXXL_ERRMSG("Returning NULL node.");
00525                         return;
00526                     }
00527                     pager_.hit(node2kick);
00528                 } while (fixed_[node2kick]);
00529 
00530                 if (reqs_[node2kick].valid())
00531                     reqs_[node2kick]->wait();
00532 
00533 
00534                 node_type & Node = *(nodes_[node2kick]);
00535 
00536                 if (dirty_[node2kick])
00537                 {
00538                     Node.save();
00539                     ++n_written;
00540                 }
00541                 else
00542                     ++n_clean_forced;
00543 
00544 
00545 
00546                 BID2node_.erase(Node.my_bid());
00547 
00548                 reqs_[node2kick] = Node.prefetch(bid);
00549                 BID2node_[bid] = node2kick;
00550 
00551                 fixed_[node2kick] = false;
00552 
00553                 dirty_[node2kick] = false;
00554 
00555                 assert(size() == BID2node_.size() + free_nodes_.size());
00556 
00557                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node_cache prefetch_node, need to kick node" << node2kick << " ");
00558 
00559                 return;
00560             }
00561 
00562             int_type free_node = free_nodes_.back();
00563             free_nodes_.pop_back();
00564             assert(fixed_[free_node] == false);
00565 
00566             node_type & Node = *(nodes_[free_node]);
00567             reqs_[free_node] = Node.prefetch(bid);
00568             BID2node_[bid] = free_node;
00569 
00570             pager_.hit(free_node);
00571 
00572             fixed_[free_node] = false;
00573 
00574             dirty_[free_node] = false;
00575 
00576             assert(size() == BID2node_.size() + free_nodes_.size());
00577 
00578             STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node_cache prefetch_node, free node " << free_node << "available");
00579 
00580             return;
00581         }
00582 
00583         void unfix_node(const bid_type & bid)
00584         {
00585             assert(BID2node_.find(bid) != BID2node_.end());
00586             fixed_[BID2node_[bid] ] = false;
00587             STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node_cache unfix_node,  node " << BID2node_[bid] );
00588         }
00589 
00590         void swap(node_cache & obj)
00591         {
00592             std::swap(comp_, obj.comp_);
00593             std::swap(nodes_, obj.nodes_);
00594             std::swap(reqs_, obj.reqs_);
00595             change_btree_pointers(btree_);
00596             obj.change_btree_pointers(obj.btree_);
00597             std::swap(fixed_, obj.fixed_);
00598             std::swap(free_nodes_, obj.free_nodes_);
00599             std::swap(BID2node_, obj.BID2node_);
00600             std::swap(pager_, obj.pager_);
00601             std::swap(alloc_strategy_, obj.alloc_strategy_);
00602             std::swap(n_found, obj.n_found);
00603             std::swap(n_not_found, obj.n_found);
00604             std::swap(n_created, obj.n_created);
00605             std::swap(n_deleted, obj.n_deleted);
00606             std::swap(n_read, obj.n_read);
00607             std::swap(n_written, obj.n_written);
00608             std::swap(n_clean_forced, obj.n_clean_forced);
00609         }
00610 
00611         void print_statistics(std::ostream & o) const
00612         {
00613             if (n_read)
00614                 o << "Found blocks                      : " << n_found << " (" <<
00615                 100. * double (n_found) / double (n_read) << "%)" << std::endl;
00616 
00617             else
00618                 o << "Found blocks                      : " << n_found << " (" <<
00619                 100 << "%)" << std::endl;
00620 
00621             o << "Not found blocks                  : " << n_not_found << std::endl;
00622             o << "Created in the cache blocks       : " << n_created << std::endl;
00623             o << "Deleted blocks                    : " << n_deleted << std::endl;
00624             o << "Read blocks                       : " << n_read << std::endl;
00625             o << "Written blocks                    : " << n_written << std::endl;
00626             o << "Clean blocks forced from the cache: " << n_clean_forced << std::endl;
00627         }
00628         void reset_statistics()
00629         {
00630             n_found = 0;
00631             n_not_found = 0;
00632             n_created = 0;
00633             n_deleted = 0;
00634             n_read = 0;
00635             n_written = 0;
00636             n_clean_forced = 0;
00637         }
00638     };
00639 }

00644 namespace std
00645 {
00646     template <class NodeType, class BTreeType>
00647     void swap(stxxl::btree::node_cache < NodeType, BTreeType > & a,
00648               stxxl::btree::node_cache<NodeType, BTreeType> & b )
00649     {
00650         a.swap(b);
00651     }
